title: The Frazers of Cabot Cove
creator_credit: Green Park Productions, Central Office of Intormation, Paul Fletcher and Humphrey Swingler
brief_description: Set against the background of outpost life in Newfoundland, once Britain’s oldest colony and now Canada’s tenth province, the film tells the love-story of Mary Frazer and shows the lives and problems of the simple fishing community in which she lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Green Park Productions, Central Office of Intormation, Paul Fletcher and Humphrey Swingler
